bill_title: to require the Department of Games, Fish and Parks to request approval of the county commissioners before any taxable real property is purchased or accepted as a gift or donation.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Department of Games, Fish and Parks to request approval of the county commissioners before any taxable real property is purchased or accepted as a gift or donation. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Before the Department of Game, Fish and Parks may purchase any taxable real property or accept any taxable real property as a gift or donation, the department shall apply to the board of county commissioners for approval. If the board of county commissioners does not approve of the purchase or acceptance of the gift or donation, the property may not be purchased or accepted. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
